home.title: TOON NINJA – Free Online TOON Editor & JSON Converter
home.description: TOON NINJA is a free online editor for TOON format. Convert JSON to TOON, reduce LLM token costs by 30-60%, validate and format with live preview.

about.title: About TOON Format – Token-Oriented Object Notation
about.description: Learn about TOON, a compact data format that saves 30-60% tokens compared to JSON. Perfect for LLM applications and AI prompts.

convert.title: JSON to TOON Converter – TOON NINJA
convert.description: Convert JSON to TOON format instantly with TOON NINJA. Reduce your LLM token count by 30-60%. Free online converter, no signup.

tokenOptimization.title: Reduce LLM Token Costs – TOON NINJA
tokenOptimization.description: Cut OpenAI and Anthropic API costs by 30-60%. TOON NINJA converts your JSON to token-efficient TOON format for ChatGPT, Claude and other LLMs.

features.title: TOON NINJA Features – Editor, Validator, Converter
features.description: TOON NINJA features: Monaco editor with syntax highlighting, JSON to TOON conversion, live validation, diff comparison, and batch editing. Free, no signup.

compare.title: TOON vs JSON – Format Comparison for AI Applications
compare.description: TOON vs JSON compared: token efficiency, readability, use cases. See why TOON saves 30-60% tokens for LLM applications while staying JSON-compatible.

hero.title: JSON to TOON Converter
hero.subtitle: Paste your JSON, get compact TOON. Reduce tokens, keep the data.

step1.title: Paste JSON
step1.description: Drop your JSON data into the editor.

hero.title: Reduce LLM Token Costs
hero.subtitle: Structured data in prompts eats tokens. Tokens cost money. Context windows fill up fast. There's a better way.

problem.title: The JSON Problem
problem.description: JSON is verbose. Quotes, brackets, colons – all consuming tokens without adding meaning. Every API call costs more than it should.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: TOON NINJA converts your JSON to TOON format – same data, 30-60% fewer tokens. No data loss, full compatibility.

savings.title: Real Savings Example
savings.description: If you spend $100/month on OpenAI and 30% is structured data, switching to TOON saves you $12-18/month. Scale that to your actual usage.

hero.title: TOON NINJA Features
hero.subtitle: A complete online editor for the TOON format. Everything you need, nothing you don't.

monaco.title: Monaco Editor
monaco.description: VS Code's editor with TOON syntax highlighting.

conversion.title: JSON ↔ TOON
conversion.description: Convert between formats with one click.

validation.title: Live Validation
validation.description: Instant error feedback as you type.

batch.title: Batch Edit
batch.description: Find and replace across your data.

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Power user? We got you covered.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Easy on the eyes, day or night.

noAccount.title: No Account
noAccount.description: Just open and use. No signup required.

hero.title: TOON vs JSON
hero.subtitle: Both formats have their strengths. Here's an honest comparison to help you decide.

whenToon.title: When to Use TOON
whenToon.description: Choose TOON when you're working with LLMs and token costs matter. Prompts with structured data, agent configurations, and AI pipelines benefit most from TOON's compact syntax.

whenJson.title: When to Stick with JSON
whenJson.description: JSON remains the right choice for public APIs, configuration files in established ecosystems, and anywhere universal tooling support matters more than token efficiency.

hero.title: The Human-Readable Data Format
hero.subtitle: TOON is a modern, human-readable data serialization format that combines the familiarity of JSON with the readability of YAML and the efficiency of tabular data.

comparison.title: TOON vs JSON
comparison.savings: ~60% smaller file size with the same data

humanReadable.title: Human Readable
humanReadable.description: Clean, indentation-based syntax that's easy to read and write without special tooling.

compact.title: Compact Format
compact.description: Significantly smaller file sizes compared to JSON, saving bandwidth and storage.

tabular.title: Tabular Arrays
tabular.description: Native support for tabular data with field headers, perfect for lists and datasets.

efficient.title: High Performance
efficient.description: Fast parsing and serialization with minimal memory footprint.

jsonCompatible.title: JSON Compatible
jsonCompatible.description: Full JSON data model support – convert between TOON and JSON losslessly.

llmFriendly.title: LLM Friendly
llmFriendly.description: Optimized for AI/LLM context windows – more data with fewer tokens.

config.title: Configuration Files
config.description: Replace JSON/YAML configs with readable, maintainable TOON files.

data.title: Data Storage
data.description: Store structured data efficiently with excellent human readability.

ai.title: AI & LLM Prompts
ai.description: Maximize context window efficiency when working with AI models.

api.title: API Responses
api.description: Reduce payload sizes while maintaining human-debuggable responses.

indentation.title: Indentation-Based
indentation.description: Uses consistent 2-space indentation to define structure – no brackets needed.

headers.title: Array Headers
headers.description: Define array structure with headers like 'users[3]' followed by field names for tabular data.

primitives.title: Unquoted Primitives
primitives.description: Numbers, booleans, and null don't need quotes – just write them directly.

delimiters.title: Flexible Delimiters
delimiters.description: Use comma, tab, or pipe as delimiters for tabular rows.

cta.title: Ready to Try TOON?
cta.description: Use the TOON Viewer to parse, explore, and edit TOON data right in your browser.

explorer.title: Explorer
explorer.loadFile: Load a TOON file to get started
